snippet.title: Space Station 13 Review
snippet.description:
Space Station 13 is like Mafia for turbo nerds and it rules. A game where you can truly do just about anything you can think of.
Check out the progress on the port to Unity https://www.patreon.com/unitystation
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
#SS13 #SpaceStation13 #SpaceStation13Review #SS13Review #SpaceStation13Game #SpaceStationGame

00:00 - Intro
00:20 - Game Premise
1:10 - Getting Space Station 13
2:48 - Game Background (Corrections, See BPL Exadv1 Interview)
4:40 - The User Interface
6:02 - Gameplay Mechanics
9:41 - Deadcrate
10:03 - Antagonist Challenges
12:32 - How to Play Shaft Miner
14:58 - Spinoff Stations
15:58 - Conclusions
16:25 - Credits
